commonQueries.description: Belirli bir cari hesabin muhasebe hesaplarini listele
commonQueries.query: SELECT cr.*, e.CODE AS MuhHesapKodu FROM LG_XXX_CRDACREF cr INNER JOIN LG_XXX_EMUHACC e ON cr.ACCOUNTREF = e.LOGICALREF WHERE cr.CARDREF = @CariRef AND cr.TRCODE = 5
